entry.title: Who's hacking at @hackonchain in Berlin 👀 Winners get a D_D NFT which grants membership to our DAO and endless possibilities to build web3 with fri...
entry.summary: Who's hacking at @hackonchain in Berlin 👀 Winners get a D_D NFT which grants membership to our DAO and endless possibilities to build web3 with friends 🫂 LGTM - Excited to see what teams ship 🫡 HackOnChain: Meet one of our partners - @developer_dao! 🤝 Developer Dao is the largest community of builders in Web 3 on the planet🔥 Winners of the hackathon will get NFT Devs for Revolution, which gives access to the D_D community 👇 https://opensea.io/collection/devs-for-revolution

entry.title: Our frens @infura_io just launched Avalanche C-Chain 🎉 Build your next DeFi application with ease and take advantage of end-to-end Web3 tooling.
entry.summary: Our frens @infura_io just launched Avalanche C-Chain 🎉 Build your next DeFi application with ease and take advantage of end-to-end Web3 tooling. Infura: Avalanche C-Chain (@avalancheavax), the PoS L1 smart-contract-specific blockchain, enables scalable Solidity-compatible dapps. Infura launches integration, making Avalanche C-Chain available for free to all Infura users. 🧵 http://ow.ly/PBl750L27H1
